item.title: 泽连斯基不顾美国反对誓言对俄罗斯发动更多无人机袭击
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）表示，尽管美国对乌克兰的行动不满，但乌克兰将继续使用国产无人机打击俄罗斯的炼油设施。【原文：Ukraine will keep targeting Russian oil-refining facilities with domestically-made drones despite US discontent with its campaign, according to President Volodymyr Zelenskiy.】

item.title: 交易所交易的外汇衍生品可能受到印度央行新法规的冲击
item.description: 据说印度央行已经确认，与卢比挂钩的交易所交易货币衍生品合约只能以套期保值为目的，而此前曾出现过允许 1 亿美元以下头寸进行非套期保值交易的混乱局面。【原文：India’s central bank is said to have confirmed that exchange-traded currency derivative contracts linked to the rupee can only be offered for hedging purposes after confusion that unhedged trades were allowed for positions below $100 million.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注欧洲，寻找股市反弹的下一站
item.description: 投资者押注欧洲将推动全球股市的下一轮反弹，扩大了他们的投资范围，因为更加昂贵的美国市场唤起了人们对网络泡沫的回忆。【原文：Investors are betting that Europe will drive the next leg of the global equity rally, broadening their playbooks as a more expensive US market evokes memories of the dot-com bubble.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长霍尔茨曼不会寻求连任奥地利银行行长
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，当他的任期于 2025 年 8 月结束时，他不会寻求连任奥地利国家银行行长。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Robert Holzmann said he won’t seek a second term as head of the Austrian National Bank when his stint ends in August 2025.】

item.title: 产品召回后日本检查小林制药公司的工厂
item.description: 日本当局检查了小林制药株式会社位于大阪的工厂，此前这家制药商召回了一些与死亡和住院有关的保健品。【原文：Japanese authorities inspected Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co.’s factory in Osaka after the drugmaker recalled some health supplements that have been linked to deaths and hospitalizations.】

item.title: 英国期待《尖峰时刻》重振工业荒地
item.description: 汤米-谢尔比（Tommy Shelby）是英国电视剧《尖峰时刻》（Peaky Blinders）的主人公，因在 20 世纪 20 年代的伯明翰管理无法无天的贫民区而闻名。【原文：Tommy Shelby, the protagonist of British TV series Peaky Blinders, is known for running lawless slum neighborhoods in 1920s Birmingham.】

item.title: 万达以 83 亿美元出让其购物中心业务控制权
item.description: 大连万达同意出让其购物中心部门的控制权，交易价值 600 亿元人民币（83 亿美元）。【原文：Dalian Wanda agreed to cede control of its shopping mall unit in a deal worth 60 billion yuan ($8.3 billion).】

item.title: 家庭能源账单将降至两年来最低点
item.description: 在 Ofgem 针对批发价格下调价格上限后，家庭平均能源账单将从下月起降至两年来的最低点。【原文：The average household energy bill is to fall to its lowest point in two years from next month after Ofgem lowered its price cap in response to wholesale prices.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）批准向埃及提供 80 亿美元贷款，全球救助计划初具规模
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）批准对埃及的贷款计划增资 50 亿美元，这是全球援助浪潮的一部分，旨在支持因加沙战争而压力倍增、步履蹒跚的埃及经济。【原文：The International Monetary Fund approved a $5 billion augmentation to its loan program for Egypt, part of a wave of global aid pledged to bolster a stumbling economy put under added pressure by the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 世界最佳货币帮助肯尼亚将通胀率降至两年低点
item.description: 肯尼亚的年度通货膨胀率降至两年来的最低点，这是因为肯尼亚货币在世界范围内的连涨帮助抑制了进口价格。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation eased to a two-year low after the currency’s world-beating streak helped rein in import prices.】

item.title: Two Sigma 称联合创始人裂痕尚未消除，老将已退出
item.description: Two Sigma Investments 披露，其亿万富豪联合创始人之间长达数年的争执继续给客户带来重大风险，并影响到该公司阻止员工离职的能力，这家价值 600 亿美元的对冲基金的一名 12 年资深员工即将离职。【原文：Two Sigma Investments disclosed that a years-long dispute between its billionaire co-founders is continuing to pose material risks to clients and affect its ability to keep staffers from leaving, with a 12-year veteran of the $60 billion hedge fund set to depart.】

item.title: 俄罗斯银行认为人民币是其储备的不二选择
item.description: 俄罗斯央行表示，在克里姆林宫对乌克兰发动战争并随后没收其国际资产两年之后，俄罗斯没有比人民币更好的储备选择。【原文：Russia’s central bank said it has no better options than the Chinese yuan for its reserves after two years of the Kremlin’s war on Ukraine and the subsequent seizure of its international assets.】

item.title: 可可价格飙升，复活节 "通缩 "冲击巧克力货架
item.description: 装满巧克力兔子和粉色棉花糖的篮子是节日的主食，预计今年复活节期间美国人在糖果上的花费将超过 50 亿美元。但今年，由于可可成本继续飙升，消费者将不得不花更少的钱买更多的东西。【原文：Baskets overflowing with chocolate bunnies and pastel-colored marshmallows are a holiday staple, with Americans forecast to spend more than $5 billion on candy this Easter season. But this year, consumers will be paying more for less as cocoa costs continue to surge.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布后，股市看涨论调仍未改变
item.description: 上个月，美联储首选的基本通胀指标降温，再加上家庭支出反弹，都未能改变华尔街的共识，而这一共识已使股市在第一季度创下历史新高。【原文：A cooldown in the Federal Reserve’s preferred gauge of underlying inflation last month, coupled with a rebound in household spending, failed to shift the Wall Street consensus that has lifted stocks to records in the first quarter.】

item.title: 备忘录、泵、失误：荒谬的加密货币眼镜卷土重来
item.description: 上周在曼哈顿举行的一次会议上，几百人聚集一堂，聆听加密货币行业的知名人士以及贝莱德（BlackRock）和富达（Fidelity）等公司的高管讨论比特币在今年进入投资主流的问题。【原文：At a conference in Manhattan last week, a few hundred people gathered to hear luminaries of the cryptocurrency industry and executives from the likes of BlackRock and Fidelity discuss Bitcoin’s march into the investing mainstream this year.】

item.title: 美联储核心通胀指标创年内最大连续涨幅
item.description: 美联储首选的基本通胀指标在 1 月份的增幅比最初报告的更大之后，上个月有所降温。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s preferred gauge of underlying inflation cooled last month after an even bigger January increase than initially reported.】

item.title: Attestor 为 Signa Prime 重组提供 1 亿欧元贷款支持
item.description: 扭亏为盈专业投资者 Attestor 有限公司将向 Signa 的破产豪宅部门提供多达 1 亿欧元（1.08 亿美元）的贷款，这是该公司在清盘过程中避免资产被出售的关键一步。【原文：Turnaround specialist investor Attestor Ltd will provide a loan of as much as €100 million ($108 million) to Signa’s insolvent luxury property unit, a key step toward avoiding a firesale of assets as it winds down.】

item.title: 韩国银行表示将就与中国挂钩的票据向投资者作出补偿
item.description: 一些韩国银行同意赔偿因与中国股票挂钩的结构性产品而蒙受损失的投资者，而就在几周前，当局称其中一些银行在销售这些复杂的工具时做了虚假陈述。【原文：Some South Korean banks agreed to compensate investors facing losses from structured products tied to Chinese stocks, just weeks after authorities said some of them misrepresented the complex instruments when making the sales.】

item.title: 波兰通胀率 36 个月来首次降至目标值
item.description: 波兰 3 月份的通胀率在三年来首次降至中央银行的目标值，尽管由于担心 2024 年晚些时候物价再次上涨，决策者们预计将保持利率稳定。【原文：Polish inflation fell to the central bank’s target for the first time in three years in March even as policymakers are expected to keep interest rates steady due to concerns over resurgent price growth later in 2024.】

item.title: 尼日利亚要求银行将最低资本金提高至 3.59 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行将贷款机构的最低资本要求提高了 10 倍，以加强面临奈拉大幅贬值、高通胀和经济疲软的行业的防御能力。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank increased the minimum capital requirements for lenders 10-fold as it seeks to bolster the defenses of an industry facing a steep naira devaluation, high inflation and a weak economy.】

item.title: 市场疲软，先正达计划撤回在华上市申请
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，先正达集团正计划撤回其在上海证券市场的上市申请。【原文：Syngenta Group is planning to withdraw its application for a stock-market listing in Shanghai, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗策略师下调美国科技股评级，涨势将扩大
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The US stock rally is set to broaden out beyond technology, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists whose outlook on the sector has turned more cautious.】

item.title: 可可价格抛物线式暴涨的更多信息
item.description:
更昂贵的巧克力可能会继续存在。【原文：

More expensive chocolate might be here to stay.

】

item.title: 法国通胀降至 2021 年 8 月以来最低水平
item.description: 法国通胀率两年半来首次低于 3%，证实了欧洲中央银行倾向于降息的趋势。【原文：French inflation eased below 3% for the first time in 2 1/2 years, confirming a trend that has tipped the European Central Bank toward cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 石油管道破裂导致南苏丹收入锐减
item.description: 由于对南苏丹向国外市场出口原油至关重要的输油管破裂，南苏丹的国家收入急剧下降。【原文：South Sudan’s state revenues have plummeted as a result of a ruptured pipeline crucial for the country’s ability to export crude to foreign markets.】

item.title: 阿联酋化学品制造商 Borouge 寻求亚洲发展目标
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的化学品生产商正在亚太地区寻找目标，尽管其最大股东正致力于将该公司与奥地利 OMV AG 公司的一个部门合并，合并金额达 300 亿欧元（320 亿美元）。【原文：The biggest chemicals producer in the United Arab Emirates is pursuing a target in the Asia-Pacific region, even as its biggest shareholder is working on a €30 billion ($32 billion) merger of the company with a unit of Austria’s OMV AG.】

item.title: 高盛称伊斯坦布尔关键投票将对里拉产生积极影响
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）分析师认为，由于本月对硬通货的需求回升，土耳其货币压力增大，周日在伊斯坦布尔举行的高风险市政投票将对土耳其里拉产生积极影响。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analysts believe that the high-stakes municipal vote in Istanbul on Sunday will have a positive impact on the Turkish lira, amid increased pressure on the currency because of revived demand for hard currency this month.】

item.title: 日本外汇管理局局长称日元暴跌不寻常，誓言必要时采取行动
item.description: 日本最高货币官员表示，近期日元疲软很奇怪，与当前的经济基本面不符，并重申他承诺在必要时采取行动，防止汇率过度波动。【原文：Japan’s top currency official said recent yen weakness is odd and out of line with current economic fundamentals, reaffirming his commitment to act if needed to prevent excessive swings in the exchange rate.】

item.title: 美国垃圾债券和金融债券的利差预示着前景将有所改善
item.description: 最能预示经济紧张的两种固定收益证券--美国垃圾债券和金融部门的高等级债券--正随着经济的发展而反弹。随着对经济衰退的担忧减弱，这一趋势可能会持续下去。【原文：Two of the fixed income securities that best portend economic strains — US junk bonds and the financial sector’s high-grade bonds — are rallying as the economy hums along. The trend may continue as fears of a recession subside.】

item.title: 起重机开始清除巴尔的摩大桥垮塌的残骸
item.description: 巴尔的摩（美联社）— 一台起重机出现在巴尔的摩一座公路桥倒塌的现场，工作人员准备于周五开始清理残骸，这些残骸阻碍了对四名失踪工人的搜寻，并阻碍了船只进出该市的重要港口。【原文：BALTIMORE (AP) — A crane appeared at the site of a collapsed highway bridge in Baltimore as crews prepared Friday to begin clearing wreckage that has stymied the search for four missing workers and blocked ships from entering or leaving the city's vital port.】
